message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and square!
You can have less, I'll take the majority!
I'm not giving up that much, I'll hold out for a better deal!
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a bit more than last time. Can we meet in the middle?
You're getting closer to the minority, I'm holding firm!
I'm not going to get squeezed out completely! I want a bigger share than 30%.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
I'm not budging, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I want a better deal, or I'll walk away.
I'm making a final offer. Take it, or we can walk away with nothing.
